content: Revenue for the three months ended June 30, 2022, and 2021 was $13.6 million and $10.3 million respectively, an increase of 32%. Revenue for the nine months ended June 30, 2022 and 2021 was $37 million and $28.4 million respectively, an increase of 30%. The advanced technology segment revenues for the three months ended June 30, 2022 increased by 40% to $8.2 million and the industrial service segment revenues for the quarter increased by 22% to $5.5 million. Total operating expenses for the three months ended June 30, 2022 were $8 million compared to $6.4 million in the prior year quarter. Operating activities for continued operations used $10.4 million for the nine months ended June 30, 2022 compared to using $6.2 million of cash for the nine months ended June 30, 2021. Net loss for the quarter ended June 30, 2022 was $0.7 million as compared to a net income of $1.1 million in 2021.
